infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Naturinex Wellness Guide uses the camera to capture medication labels so you can learn about natural wellness alternatives. This helps you make informed decisions about your health.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Naturinex Wellness Guide accesses your photos to analyze medication labels and provide educational wellness information. Your photos are processed locally and not stored on our servers.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Naturinex Wellness Guide can save wellness analysis results to your photo library for easy reference and to share with your healthcare provider.

plugins.cameraPermission: Naturinex Wellness Guide uses the camera to capture product labels for educational wellness information

plugins.photosPermission: Naturinex needs access to your photos to analyze medication images
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Naturinex needs permission to save analysis results to your photos

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow Naturinex to use Face ID for secure access to your health data
